import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Article } from '../models'; @Component({ selector: 'app-article-preview', templateUrl: './article-preview.component.html' }) export class ArticlePreviewComponent { @Input() article: Article; onToggleFavorite(favorited: boolean) { this.article['favorited'] = favorited; if (favorited) { this.article['favoritesCount']++; } else { this.article['favoritesCount']--; } } }
